com.compendium.io.jabber
Class BSRegisterBean

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.io.jabber.BSRegisterBean

public class BSRegisterBean
extends java.lang.Object

BSRegisterBean provides new account registration handling. It relies on BSInfoQueryBean, which must be set after each reconnection.

handleError

private void handleError(InfoQuery iq,
                         BSRegState task)
Handles InfoQuery packet, if it does contain an error. Before this is called it checks if that is response on the sent IQ authentication packet.

handleResult

private void handleResult(InfoQuery iq,
                          BSRegState task)
Handles InfoQuery packet, if it does contain a result. Before this is called it checks if that is response on the sent IQ authentication packet.

removeAllRegListeners

public void removeAllRegListeners()
Removes all listeners notified when registration state changes. This can be used before to free dependencies and allow dispose of all objects.

See Also:
addRegListener(com.compendium.io.jabber.BSRegListener), removeRegListener(com.compendium.io.jabber.BSRegListener), #notifyRegListeners
